Author: coldfeetfuzzysocks
Text: If I remember correctly they actually do. Protein has somewhere around 5kcal/g when measured with a caloriemeter -> \~4kcal/g when you take the thermal effect into consideration. Now, I read this like years ago so I'll try to find the source.

Author: gigi-has-issues
Text: No, but I'm sure that TDEE and BMR calculations also don't take into consideration the thermal effect of food, so it's a wash.
